about_the_game:
Enjoy the full Neighbor soundtrack, written by veteran game composer Takami Ryu! Includes the original vocal theme song Neighbor, sung by Kawamura Rie, voice of the game's protagonist Kae.
The soundtrack comes in the form of both lossless WAV and lossy MP3 audio files downloaded to the game's installation folder.

Full tracklist:
1. Everyday life
2. unreality
3. strangeness
4. foreboding
5. weird
6. 爽やかな朝
7. reminiscence
8. sorrow
9. club berry
10. Let's drink to our charming hostess
11. After that
12. Neighbor

name: Neighbor - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: An audio playback program which can play WAV or MP3 files is required.
